item.title: Trump Begins Buildup of U.S. Naval Forces Outside Venezuela, but Many Remain Skeptical
item.description: President Nicolás Maduro said Venezuela would not back down while facing a U.S. naval buildup. But many in the country doubt a confrontation will come...

item.title: Map: 7.5-Magnitude Earthquake Strikes the South Atlantic Ocean
item.description: View the location of the quake’s epicenter and shake area.

item.title: ‘No Meeting Planned’ Between Putin and Zelensky, Top Russian Diplomat Says
item.description: It was the clearest sign yet that President Trump’s push for an imminent summit was faltering.

item.title: Global Monitors Confirm Famine in Part of Gaza. What Does That Mean?
item.description: A panel of food security experts said the famine could spread to more of the enclave within weeks.

item.title: Thaksin Shinawatra, Former Thai Premier, Cleared of Insulting Monarchy
item.description: But the reprieve for Thaksin Shinawatra, who remains a political force, did not mean that the legal troubles for him and his family were over.
